sentences.en: An anticipatory story is a trap to the teller.
sentences.cn: 对于讲故事的人而言,事先想好的故事是个框框.

sentences.en: Every bank pays close attention to the speed and accuracy of its tellers.
sentences.cn: 每家银行都密切关注其出纳员的速度和准确性。

sentences.en: Grandma was a good teller of stories.
He is an amusing story teller.
sentences.cn: 他讲的故事很使人发笑.

sentences.en: He told the teller that he didn't want anything.
sentences.cn: 他告诉出纳,说他什么也不要.

sentences.en: He wants me to teller to hand in the item there.
sentences.cn: 他要我到出纳员那儿交款.

sentences.en: He was a good story - teller and used to make up tales about farmers and animals.
sentences.cn: 他是个讲故事的好手,常编一些农夫和动物的故事.

sentences.en: Mr. Smith takes the biscuit as a story teller.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生讲故事是无与伦比的.

sentences.en: She worked as a teller in a local bank.
sentences.cn: 她在当地一家银行当出纳.

sentences.en: Since Henry had become teller the family had acquired a piano.
sentences.cn: 从亨利当出纳员以后,家里买了一架钢琴.

sentences.en: The bank started her as a teller.
The story teller stretched the story out.
sentences.cn: 讲故事的人把故事拖长了.

sentences.en: The teller is adding up her receipts.
sentences.cn: 出纳员正把所收的款项加起来.

sentences.en: The teller stopped, stunned, and suddenly began to cry.
sentences.cn: 叙述者停住了, 惊呆了, 接着突然大哭起来.

sentences.en: The thief waved his gun at the bank teller.
sentences.cn: 那个贼向银行出纳员挥舞他的枪.

sentences.en: You didn't go to the fortune - teller, did you?
sentences.cn: 你不相信算命的, 是不是?

words.tran_cn: （美）出纳员；讲述者；讲故事者；计票员

phrases.tran_cn: 自动取款机；自动柜员机

trans.tran_cn: 出纳员，叙述者，银行柜员机，计票人
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to receive and pay out money in a bank
